website_summaries.verdict: High marks for excellent sound quality, exceptional portability features, and 7 colors.
pros: connects to multiple devices at once
can be flipped vertically, all helpful features outdoors and indoors
The connect+ feature allows connecting multiple JBL speakers to single device to cover wider area
cons: Battery might require more frequent charging than other models

customer_reviews.title: It's junk after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son in December & Sounded good as a main speaker for his lap top, that is until it stopped charging. Purchased 12/7/2017, used from 12/25/2017 (10 or 15 times) until it stopped charging 2/10/18. Amazon return dead line was 1/31/18 & product support window closed 2/5/2018. Not happy with JBL at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jhoze

customer_reviews.title: It's often untrue to state that "you get what you pay for." In this instance, you DO get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this speaker. My immediate reaction is ... WHOA!!!! After just one night spent using it, I am simply blown away by the sound quality. It gets LOUD if you want it to and pumps out surprisingly powerful bass. To be frank, it sounds like an old-school boom box that could really bang, except the footprint is much smaller. This is such an upgrade from all of the ordinary portable speakers that I've encountered. This is also an upgrade from JBL products made just a few years ago, speaking anecdotally. This sort of thing has apparently come a LONG way.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Big quality in a small package
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research on what I was looking for and wanted I went with the JBL flip 4. I love and wanted this Blue not offered in the Flip 5 and also was looking for something that was budget friendly to me. I could not be happier with the sound quality, the physical quality, the appearance, battery life (used for 12 hours with no issues) and the price. Awesome buy, I’d highly recommend and will be buying more JBL products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Believe The Hype; DON'T BUY THE FLIP 5!
customer_reviews.text: It's just as amazing as all the reviews say. This little guy gets LOUD with NO distortion whatsoever (even at max volume). The bass is outstanding for the size. Watching the tiny subwoofers on the sides vibrate to bass-heavy tunes is great. It's a total dream. I highly recommend going with this over the new JBL Flip 5 as JBL made the shocking decision to make them mono instead of stereo. I can only imagine they did this to push their bluetooth-link feature and get extra speaker sales from customers who want stereo sound. Weak, but at least the Flip 4s are still available and AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Where Are My Droids?

customer_reviews.title: Good little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd flip I have purchased. And other than getting my last one warrantied I love em. Link them all together they sound great. Battery life is great can listen all day at work. Other than my replacement jbl sent me which I think has some programming defect because I have already replaced the battery and it still won't charge all the way and battery last 30 minutes at elevated volume. There is always one that slips thru quality control. That didn't prevent me from getting the blue one which works flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Good but some “eh”
customer_reviews.text: Sound and bass are stellar! For it’s size, this speaker will fill my 2 bedroom apartment with beautifully mellow sound, even at the high end volume range. However, even at low to medium volume the battery hardly lasts 4 hours, compared to it’s advertised 12hr lifespan. Because of that it now mostly stays corded in the corner of my living room, rather than on the go which is what I originally bought it for
customer_reviews.author: Logan Becker

customer_reviews.title: Good product but battery life is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I order both the JBL Flip 4 $70 and the Tribit $32. The Flip 4 has better sound quality and bass. The Tribit was well worth the $32 but does not have the rich bass and does not sound as good as the Flip. Both were worth the money spent. I initially gave this product 4 stars but downgraded to 3. It never has last 12 hours not even 8. At 90% volume it lasts 6 hours(thats with a brand new unit) and lasts 7.5 hours max at 80% volume. Still a decent product..... when its plugged in to a power source.
customer_reviews.author: Benedetto Franzoso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality, refined features
customer_reviews.text: We have several bluetooth speakers and this is by far the best. Consistent connection to phones and assistants (Amz & Google's) while delivering a well rounded sound (ok, a little bass heavy but that's pretty amazing from such a small footprint). Thoughtful charging features, not-terribly annoying startup/shutdown sounds, truly waterproof, takes a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph McCall

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a previous one I lost somewhere as I use it to Bluetooth music from my phone when I teach cheerleading. Love the blue, volume level is great but that also depends on the volume of your phone your using with it as my previous phone volume was terrible so I badly needed the speaker. Battery life lasts me about 2 days or so with me running it for at least 6-8 hrs day at home. Charges in about 2 hrs and it is supposedly waterproof but I haven't tested that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Mo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I loved this speaker! The sound was incredible...until it just stopped charging one day. I looked up reviews and found it could need a new battery (I did use it almost everyday) I order a new battery, installed it, speaker went on for about 20 seconds, with one little light flashing where it tells you if the battery has a charge. So I charged it. Or so I thought. It wont even take a charge. No lights at all go on. And that is with the new battery in it. Of course, as of September my time was up to get any help on the expensive little speaker. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: sarah dedden dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is a POWER HOUSE. The bluetooth is awesome. If the speaker is on, my phone automatically finds it. I take it out to my arena while I ride my horses, on the waverunners and beach, pretty much anywhere I need a portable. The battery seems to last forever once you give it a full charge. They say 12 hours, and I believe it. The speaker will tell you how much power it has left. Easy on and off button. Pretty simple device with fantastic sound. I still can't get over how small it is for such good sound though. Crazy.
customer_reviews.author: MR-LR

customer_reviews.title: battery stinks
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this speaker is fantastic. Definitely five stars on sound. Bluetooth gets 4 stars because it will randomly just stop playing and ill have to reconnect. 1 star on battery. It says "up to 12 hours of playtime" in the ads, which is three times the max that I have gotten out of it. On a good day, I will get 4 hours of playtime from a fully charged battery which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but one flaw...
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, quality speaker. Good features and sound quality. the ONE issue with this is, on certain songs, the bass will cause the speaker to make a slight rattling sound. It sounds a tad bit like a blown speaker, but it isn't. We have even tried another new speaker. It always happens on the same songs, regardless of high, medium or low volume. I think that certain low frequencies must be causing this. Other bass-heavy songs sound just fine. It's an odd issue that I have not heard until this speaker came into my home. Very satisfied overall though.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while, but battery won't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I used this speaker all the time at home and at work in many different environments. Unfortunately, after about 2 years, I've begun having issues with the battery. It will show fully charged, then proceed to play music for about 10 mins before claiming that the battery is dead and shutting off. When you plug in the speaker, it'll show that that battery is at 4/5 bars even though it just died. It was solid while it worked, but as of now it's essentially useless to me as I'd have to keep it plugged in all the time to use it effectively, which isn't what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Diefenbach

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers!
customer_reviews.text: All around great speaker if you can get it for around $50. The highs are a tad muted but the depth of soundstage is excellent. The bass is good but not too deep. The vocals come out sounding amazing. The JBL app is a bit underwhelming though since there is nothing really you can do for the speakers. There is no Equalizer in the app for the speaker which is disappointing. I use it for my home office. Really waiting for the price to drop again so I can have them as a pair as both left and right speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Thoko

customer_reviews.title: worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version that the dog decided looked pretty tasty (it wasn't lol). So, I needed a new one. it does what it's supposed to do. I like to sit on my 3-season room and listen to MLB games across the country and watch meteor showers with Pink Floyd or the Dead playing. The only suggestion i have is that it could play a little louder. But, I will definitely look at buying this again if the dog didn't learn her lesson the 1st time. silly Corso's smh
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I had time over the holiday to give this a workout. I have had a couple of lower end speakers previously and tried some high end units in the stores. The sound quality is excellent. It has crisp, sharp highs, very good blending into the mid-range and a deep driving bass, when provided in the original music. I can't see why anyone would need any more sound then this delivers, and at a price point well below $100.. In my opinion this purchase, after the workout, turns out to be a NOBRAINER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Steib

customer_reviews.title: Little speaker. Big noise.
customer_reviews.text: This little things pack a big punch! My favorite thing is the fact that they connect with other JBL speakers so I can have one outside. One in the living room. One in the kitchen & they are all playing the same thing. Surround sound vibe without the pain in the butt install (currently renting). I can also shove one in my weekend bag or carry on for trips out of town to play music while I get dressed or whatever wherever I may be going. Some speaker enthusiast or someone wanting to piss of the neighbor may need something bigger but for me in my 3 bedroom town home I find these perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kaila T

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for one that broke within the first 4 months of use. These are not made like they used to be. My JBL Charge 2 is still running strong where i don't think it would be if it were a Flip4. They just don't make them like they used to. As far as sound. It's not bad. No super lows, but sounds pretty good overall. These have a known problem with them. The on button stops working and will not reset eventually.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: 7 months in, battery won't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with this speaker for the first 6 months of its life. It was loud, you could pair it with another Flip 4 for more sound power and it was reliable. However in the last month it will no longer hold a charge and won't even stay on while plugged in. I have looked up all kinds of "remedies" and diy fixes for this but nothing has helped so far. I have done everything except take it apart fully which, for the price and nambrand I don't feel like I should have to do after 7 months. Very disappointed. Meanwhile, my original JBL Flip 1 is still alive and kicking!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. A few years ago I bought a Flip 2. It worked great but the battery life seemed to suffer as time went on and eventually would not even hold a charge. For precautionary measures, I got the 5-year warranty on this one, but so far it is going strong. The crisp sound quality is as expected and I like the high bass. The only issue I have with this speaker is the volume is not as high when plugged in through aux cord, as opposed to Bluetooth. I've tried turning up the volume on my phone and the speaker, but to no avail. Overall, I'm impressed by this item and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase of a JBL flip
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. The sound quality is great for the cost and size of the unit. I purchased the waterproof version. I do wish it still this version had the usb option so you could charge your phone off of the speaker as you used the product. I used my last one for several years and then had issues with trying to charge the speaker because of the connection. I am trying the product again, hopefully they have improved this issue. If it were not for this issue, I would have given it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for such a small, portable, package.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly good sound for what it is. The form factor is the same as a 'Tall Boy' beer can; will even fit in cup holders. Best performance when backed up to a hard surface. Sound will fill a room but comes across a little tinny outside. OTOH, won't annoy nearby campers. Plenty loud enough outside doing chores when on dash, up against windshield of SxS. Also handy for watching movies on your tablet. Now I want a tablet with a bigger screen! Make sure the JBL red square is pointing at you. Maybe 4 hours of performance when played loud. Bluetooth easily connects. Already dropped it off a table and it survived.
customer_reviews.author: Bob A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in this price range
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my job in preschools. My employer supplied a $35 inferior product. I decided to purchase my own and I’m very pleased. It’s easily heard in the classroom, and at home we use it by the pool. I’ve only had it a month so I can’t comment on reliability. It comes in a sturdy storage box, great if you have to move from school to school. I’m gonna keep trying to get my boss to buy me one so I can keep mine at home.
customer_reviews.author: Lambillek

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed almost daily
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about this product because everything has 2sides story to it. I did a lot of research on it and read a bunch of reviews. It went on sale so I decided to take a chance. It works better than expected and I was surprised. I knew JBL box speaker was good in the past because I owned them before, but to put everything in this little cylinder it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Yernificent1998

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my sons have one now so no more bargaining about who gets to use it. They swear by them, not at them. Battery stays charged really well. Fits into the bottle holder on a bike so that your kid can have music while riding without wearing ear buds. These can play very loud if you want them too. They have tried other brands but these tried and true JBL's are what they ask for. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: Speaker Cuts Out if Volume Low - Otherwise, Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: So, I really like this unit, the sound quality is amazing. I have noticed it tends to shut down though if the volume is low and I have to turn it back on. I don't know if that's the cause, but it seems to be. I also factory reset it because I didn't know what was happening. I like the look though and as I said, sound quality, so I just bought a matching one. I'm using as my computer speakers. Overall, worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: sounds great in doors or outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife last Christmas and she still loves it. She uses it nearly everyday, sounds great in doors or outside. I would absolutely buy it again and may do just that. I like to listen to talk-radio while working around the farm it would be great in the pickup connected to my iPhone using the TuneIn app. Maybe my wife will read this and get me one for Christmas this year.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Portable Music
customer_reviews.text: I had been meaning to buy this product for a long time now and ended up buying it right in time for our X-Mass party last year. I love the fact that I just need to set up on the music on my phone and I can then take it in to whatever room in my house that I am doing work on and not have to worry about my phone getting damaged. Great sound, good battery life and love how easy it was to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is s small, fairly light speaker with a surprising lot of sound. Pros: Good battery life Resist water but only to a few feet. Lets you talk on the phone if it rings without having to turn it off. Easy to figure out. All kinds of fancy ways to use more than one at once. CONS: Bass can be boomy in small spaces. Sound can distort but onlt when pushed very hard
customer_reviews.author: sally siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this speaker as a gift for me. I wanted a Bluetooth speaker that wasn’t too big but had great sound quality. This speaker is awesome. Sound is clear, bass is good and it gets pretty loud for a small speaker. It reminds of the days when guys were walking around with a boom box on their shoulder Lol. Great buy for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanGaPeach

customer_reviews.title: Love this, definitely water proof!
customer_reviews.text: Friend of mine has a first gen and I liked it a lot. This one is louder and super clear!! Great battery life and tough, I have 4 kids who like to use it too and I can testify to it’s waterproofing because it was dropped in the kids pool by my 5 year old. Probably going to buy another to use the stereo function!
customer_reviews.author: BigTrav

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy to use, great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker really impressed me. For its size the sound is very rich and the bass is impressive. Near full volume the quality falls off, but full volume is surprisingly loud. I used this in my RV driving down the highway so the kids could listen to a movie. Even with highway noise and wind noise driving 75 in an RV they could hear just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakers
customer_reviews.text: What's stopping this from 5 stars is the connectivity issues, specifically on Android. I frequently have to turn them back on and off again because the audio skips when connecting to android. Other than that battery life is long enough to last a day if fully charged, the sound quality is great, and when connected to another JBL Flip it rivals some stereos.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it when performing chores around the house nearly everyday. The sound quality is appealing and the EQ feels balanced. The only downside is that it would have been nicer if it came with an normal outlet plug and not only a USB. Otherwise, the product is nice tool to set the mood in my space. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Malik Lendell

customer_reviews.title: Good by the pool
customer_reviews.text: Overall product works as stated. The directions indicate that it should have shipped with a wire to connect to pc. Amazon sent a whole new unit. It too didn’t have said wire. So I just won’t connect to pc.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Yamshon

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a different speaker that looked like the JBL but the sound quality was poor. The sound quality of the JBL is fantastic! We've run it for hours on Christmas day and have yet to charge it again. It's small enough to tuck off to the side without it being seen and we can all enjoy the music.
customer_reviews.author: sdb_md

customer_reviews.title: Sub par blue tooth with 2 or more linked
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I had one of these and it was awesome! A friend told me I could link them together. So I got 2 more for around the pool. Let me tell you the Bluetooth functionality when linking these together is HORRIBLE! Constantly dropping signal. Even using the JBL app. These speakers are great on their own, but if you link more than 1 together get ready for frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: One great bluetooth speaker, that does it all.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Flip 2 to the Flip 4, wow,! should not waited this long. Better sounding, better bass, and most importantly longer lasting battery life. JBL does is it right, how do they such great sound out of a such small package? Package comes with the unit and a orange USB cable, no charger. No worries there's enough USB ports around the house now. Easily this unit could provide all the sound needed for a flat, barn, boat, etc.... and last for up to 12 hrs. Worth every cent...
customer_reviews.author: David C Johns

customer_reviews.title: Great sound; terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, awesome bass for the size. Unfortunately, the charge does not last long. After the first 1-2 uses, the next few charges have only lasted an hour or so. Definitely not 12 hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: onlinesurfer

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for its size. We bought it to hook up to our second generation echo. It connect easily and once it's turned on the echo finds it moments later. So far it's lived it's life inside so I can't speak to its ability to handle water but other than that I'm quite happy. I'm also getting quite long battery life, constant use at higher volume last 8+ hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Beitler

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and very loud! I have dropped this thing from 5 feet and had no digs dents or scratches. I used it nearly everyday for 2-3 hours at the gym and could use it for 3-4 days straight before needing to charge it. Also, pairing it with other JBLs was so simple just a push of the button, and you can’t hear any delay between the two!
customer_reviews.author: Rylan

customer_reviews.title: I like this so much more than the Logitech UE Boombox ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much more than the Logitech UE Boombox that was all bass. I got the Flip 4 rather than Charge because the Charge's have become big and bloated. My son has the old Charge 2 and says that is the best in the JBL lineup. His definitely seems to have more oomph than my Flip 4. But I got the Flip 4 refurbished (and a little dinged up) for a lot less. If I were doing it again, I'd find a refurbished Charge 2.
customer_reviews.author: bluesjr

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, best sounding bluetooth speaker for it’s size! Plays loud enough on a deck for small party. Great frequency balance, clarity and good bass but put it in a corner and the bass becomes amazing. The only concern I have is durability and stain-proof of the fabric cover, wish it was metal screen. I would also be nice if the rubber created a lengthwise stand instead of having to sit on the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: MikeF

customer_reviews.title: They're just great!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got one for my wife a while back and I always thought it produced some pretty good sound and gets really loud. We use it for hikes and biking. But every now and then we forget to charge it and then we're stuck without a speaker to go on our trips. So I decided to get another one as backup. I got the cobalt blue one because it's just so pleasing to my eyes to look at. Still produces great sound and gets loud just how I like it. I recommend these 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Resendiz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for small pool or garden area
customer_reviews.text: We have a small pool in our backyard in sizzling hot Texas. We hang the speaker from our canopy over the pool and get great results. While floating in the pool, we hook up to Pandora on Bluetooth (via phone or tablet) and play whatever we're in the mood for, and hear it clearly and at the perfect volume level. It isn't an indoor sound system. It's an outdoor, pool-floating wonder. The fact that it's waterproof is an added bonus. A definite must for those pool-floating, music-loving addicts. If you have a small space in your backyard in need of some chill-me-out music, this works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: like the product just fine but.....
customer_reviews.text: sounds good and easy to cart around especially compared with cost of other products but............ bluetooth tech has a way to go before it matchs. My guess is bluetooth is too complicated and too many different hooking products to be of convenient use and this is dragging down good products such as this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: lensop

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: When you get this brand new it works perfectly and has a long battery life. After a month or two you can't even leave a charged in the wall and have it last longer than an hour and a half or two hours. I wouldn't advise buying this product because the battery is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hahn

customer_reviews.title: A Great Portable Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased two of these speakers - first one for our older granddaughter and then another for her younger sister. They love the speakers, which have great sound quality and seem to be very durable. They are easy to operate, with very good battery life. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: rr miami fl

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: This has better sound than the other waterproof speakers I tried: Anker and DOSS. Bass response is good for a speaker this size. I would have preferred a rectangular form factor rather than round, but the shape may have to do with the acoustics design. It has two small subwoofers at each end of the cylinder. Sound is lively and works for music and speech.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest fit.
customer_reviews.text: I would buy these if I knew that they weren't the greatest fit. I had to cut a couple places out. On the bottom there to long & the tape barely hits the metal of the truck. I had to drill hole & rivet. They back of the cab where it wraps around won't hold. My doors rub on it. I guess that's what you get for going cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Nord Williams

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED WITH THIS SPEAKER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted in a small portable speaker. The sound is booming indoors and outdoors. The battery lasts about a full work days worth of jamming. I was also caught in the rain unexpectedly and the speaker kept the party going. Really good purchase. Oh and I was able to pair with another JBL Flip4 speaker and that made the sound even better of course. Really simple to pair using the app. I'd get another of these, but I really don't need one. lol :D
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Can not get her to turn it down
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for IPAD use as it was hard to here from internal speakers. It can be taken any wear - she does... and durable and sound quality is superb. I have not tried it on quality recordings, but what it is used for it does what it states. I would buy another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Guy_A

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one for myself last year. My husband said he didn’t want one but kept eyeing mine so I surprised him for Father’s Day with one. He said he wouldn’t use it but he uses it all the time. Instead of “suggesting” what stations I can put on mine he now picks his own. Great quality product. I use mine every day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Beat my Bose link
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have a Bose link this JBL is better!
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love my speaker! I have a Bose and love them both- they’re pretty equal to me. I wanted something I could take to the pool and more use outside, so I went with the JBL. Im happy I did, good sound quality and I like the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker. I. Love. It.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in an aircraft hangar, where the ambient noise level is high and I'm usually 20-50 ft or more away from it, and it is still more than loud enough! Bluetooth stays connected to almost 200ft away, with all kinds of things between. And it's waterproof?!? Battery lasts a good while. It's tough and looks awesome. I. Love. It.
customer_reviews.author: wheelyboard

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for my birthday so my husband ordered it for me. I like the sound quality compared to the cheaper one I bought that is an Amazon speaker. It's small enough to easily carry anywhere you want. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It was easy setting up the BT. The sound quality is excellent. I use it at the beach and in my yard. Friends have commented positively on the sound quality. I've used it a half dozen times for 4 or 5 hours each time and haven't had an issue with the battery dying.
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood27

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks for something not replaceable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in either late summer or early fall last year and have used it every day since to a point where it quit on Battery needing to be recharged, but now the battery only lasts for 4 to 5 hours and doesn't come back as quick when charged. The sound quality is great though so I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speaker
customer_reviews.text: So far well worth the money. I bought this after getting a AOMIS boombox that was about 3X the size. The boombox lasted about 6 months before it stopped working. This little thing sounds at least 5X better. Maybe I'm getting old, but it is amazing what they can pack into such a small package. Super easy to pair to my iPhone 7. Just turned it on and went into Bluetooth and it was there. Sounds great. If it lasts more than 6 months it will be well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: micdud

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker with Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for my wife to use when she visits clients to do her personal fitness training. She l-o-v-e-s this speaker. The sound is rich, not tinny like many portable speakers. The bluetooth works very well and the battery lasts all day through many sessions.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyMac

customer_reviews.title: No case needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a total of three for myself and family members. #do not run out to buy a case.# I did with two of them, but after the third I began having a look at it’s original packaging and concluded that it was more than sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday is an Adventure

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read good reviews about this speaker but you still just never know. Well they were all true! This thing cranks as loud a big stereo system speaker! And I thought the battery never would die! It lasted 6 times longer than any Bluetooth speaker I've ever had. Great product! And if you think it's too expensive, think again. I could have already bought two of these with all of the cheap Bluetooth speakers that I've spent money on. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Keister

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love my JBL 4! I can’t believe I spent this much money on a speaker but it is a great purchase and after hearing the quality of sound I know it is not a waste. My kids can operate it easy as well. Very user friendly and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jaylene Frandsen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the size
customer_reviews.text: Pretty loud sounding speaker. Fills the room your in with a rich crispy sound if you love to listen to country. Good for corridos as well and reggeton being outside with the family. If your looking for a more punchy speaker bass wise i'd recommend the Xtreme JBL. That will be my next buy for partys.
customer_reviews.author: David Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Me Connected
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Flip 4. I am very please with the speaker. It allows me to hear my computer programs/videos as I move around the house from room to room. Just grab my Flip and the interviews and news continue where ever I am without missing a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L.

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but after two years too many problems
customer_reviews.text: This product was great, at first. I bought a JBL speaker the beginning of 2018, two years later it’s failing me more often than not. My dad and I bought one around the same time and his speaker is experiencing the same issues. The speakers will start sounding like a duck quacking and the battery dies sooooo fast. I have to constantly have it on the charger. It was great at first, but I would prefer a product that will last more than just two years.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Olguin

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. No micro SD slot
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds great and pairs up effortlessly. It does not have a micro sd slot. I returned it and got 2 Xeneo X21’s for the same price. They sound just about as good, plus have fm radio and a micro sd slot.
customer_reviews.author: Chellejeff

customer_reviews.title: Tough little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love my JBL! It holds up to some tough treatment. I use it in desert heat at the river and on off road vehicles. It takes a beating and keeps the music coming. This is my second one. The first one I had for about 3 years and it held up great until it fell in the water without my knowledge, I thought I lost internet connection. When I came back to the shore after a swim it was under about a foot of water. I dried it out and surprisingly it worked but it lost some of the quality in the sound. I
customer_reviews.author: Chris M. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this speaker. The sound quality is amazing and the battery lasts for a long time. I was worried about purchasing a “renewed” speaker, but I haven’t had any problems and it looked brand new when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Morais

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I can now listen to my music like its a boombox! I have spotify on my phone so this is great. Got the hubby one too and we can play the same thing on both and be super jammin! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2JTD3

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality for ocasional situations. It's very handy and light weight to carry everywhere. It's a very good device to have. I can notice some aspects of the sound that are not that good, but I'm a musician... If you are not that picky, I doubt you will notice any diference... And for a speaker so small it's quality is above the average.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: Did some research on this before I bought it. Was looking at Bose and this came up. The reviews were so good and the price was great so we gave it a try. Love this!!! We take it fishing and use it out by the pool. We’ve used it inside when having a party as well. Great sound quality, Bluetooth connects easily so the younger kids can play their music. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dwhite0312

customer_reviews.title: Do not play well when paired.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these so I could pair them and fill the first floor of my home with music. They both play great independently, but when paired one will often fade out or be distorted. They are both within a reasonable distance of each other and the device that is sending the signal. Disappointed with pairing performance.
customer_reviews.author: Samual O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for months now and have enjoyed it so much. The sound quality is great no matter the volume. It's clear and has the great bass. I plan to purchase another speaker because I have others enjoying it too.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a number of portable speakers, bluetooth and otherwise, and for the money these are my favorites. Great sound quality, good battery life, and they feel solid. Have yet to have them in wet weather but they are supposed to be good for that. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Loud and proud
customer_reviews.text: I have takem this hiking and to the pool for the what seems to be the whole day and the battery has never died. It sounds great. I charge at night and use all day. Super easy to connect to and has never dropped connection
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER SHERIDAN

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is by far not a professional DJ sound bar but if you listen to music at a reasonable sound level you will be pleased with the sound quality. Not sure how that heavy sounding rap crap will go with low bass however
customer_reviews.author: BillyMe

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic, clear, bright, loud. It sits on my night stand and works perfectly with my iPod touch. I never have to tell to find the device, it always pairs. I wish it would stop blinking all the time while it’s waiitng to be connected via Bluetooth, that’s the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, not fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, you can set it just about anywhere. Sound is pretty good, I had hoped a bit more from JBL, bass is ok, treble isn’t great, mids ok. I use BOSE for other devices so, I didn’t except the same of course.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speaker I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought some $30 speakers before and they work fine for nearby listening, but I was talked into spending a little more for a quality speaker to use on our pontoon boat, and I am glad that I did!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite JBL speaker for sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the portability of JBL speakers. This one has the best sound of the others I have heard. The JBL charge is nice for the power storage but really doesn't compare with the sound of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Cowhippie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker did not disappoint! The battery life is very long. It is sturdy and easy to use. It doesn't drop connection. I was listening to it when I received a call. The caller asked why I was so much clearer than usual. I didn't buy it for phone use but apparently it sounds clearer than my phone on regular speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Best lifestyle proof speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Find me a better sounding *waterproof* speaker with this price point, I dare you! I doubt the product testers had me in mind for this product, but I took this on a deployment to South Sudan and clipped this guy to my bag to pass the time and keep me moving on half day walks through waist deep swamps. The bag (and I) slipped many times into the water and the speaker never faltered once. Garnered a lot of attention from some locals I worked with. Ended up leaving it behind and bought another replacement as soon as I was back home because I liked it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Speaker goes boom after a year or two
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great for a year or two, then all of a sudden on fully charged whiles playing you get a loud distortion and it switches off on dead battery. Quite a few of my friends experienced the same issue. Won’t buy again unless JBL do something about this.
customer_reviews.author: Linden

customer_reviews.title: Giving as a gift -  looks nice - hope it performs as listed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my daughter in law - haven’t given it to her yet so cannot give a review at this time . Read reviews before purchasing - hope it lasts a long time . Can update again later
customer_reviews.author: bjg

customer_reviews.title: This has Great Sound for the Size
customer_reviews.text: I use this for bike riding. It fits right in the water bottle holder on my bike. Ive used this for 20 mile bike rides at full volume and have no issues with battery life. I feel this is a great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.author: kevin boles

customer_reviews.title: Really nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my first JBL speaker and I really like it. Haven’t had any problems connecting via Bluetooth as I have with other inexpensive speakers I’ve had. All in all good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound - you should buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This sounds on this is amazing. I have other larger speakers that don't sound nearly as good. It's easy to connect via Bluetooth and the battery is great. This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Candice C

customer_reviews.title: Take this little but powerful speaker everywhere you go
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this JBL Flip 4 portable speaker. I user it almost every day and take it with me every place I travel. Have 2 of them now and connect them together for stereo sound. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: Not good as a speakerphone
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this as a speakerphone for conference calls as well as listen to music. I was expecting better high-range audio, but the sound isn't as clear as I expected and the mic failed the concall test. I wouldn't recommend it as a speakerphone, but it is a good mid-range audio solution.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! We have one on each floor of the house and 1 in the camper. The water resistant is a great feature for camping! These are really durable as well and they sound great!!
customer_reviews.author: Skrbevolo

customer_reviews.title: Typical JBL speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of jbl equipment, Mostly because I like a lot of bass, this speaker does not disappoint. It still has a full sound even though I only have the one.
customer_reviews.author: cmw

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker... I have other small portable bluetooth speakers that play music but the sound isnt all that great... this speaker actually sounds great... I like this speaker... my wife has the charge 3 so I decided to try the flip cause is smaller and more portable... it not as loud as the charge but this flip 4 is a great speaker...
customer_reviews.author: Deke

customer_reviews.title: Works great, battery lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, battery lasts quite a long time at medium volume. Cranked up it's not as loud as I was expecting, but it doesn't distort and is still louder than I'd normally listen to. Bass is ok for "something this size", but nothing to write home about. I plan to buy another at some point and use the Connect feature to get real stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound is huge and connecting via Bluetooth is a breeze. I'll definitely be buying another one to link and have the full surround sound feel. The battery has lasted a long time through many uses.
customer_reviews.author: jrp510

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Don't really know about battery life but the thing does sound really good. Bought it for the lake house so the boat does not have to be on non stop when we are sitting on the dock. Tried it at the house and it sounds really good.
customer_reviews.author: Addict

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Flip 4!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the flip 4. We have 3 of them in the house, great sound quality at high volume, good bass, and excellent battery life. Waterproof makes it even better. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: I traveled with one of these for 4 months in Asia and it is AMAZING. Get a cover case
customer_reviews.text: I have had Bose and other wireless speakers. I traveled with one of these for 4 months in Asia and it is AMAZING. Get a cover case. I am now buying one of each of these to give as gifts. Con: The ability to connect two or more of these is real. But they have to be so close to eachother that it is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Mitten

product_meta.title: JBL Flip 4 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue

JBL Flip 4 is the next generation in the award-winning Flip series; it is a portable Bluetooth speaker that delivers surprisingly powerful stereo sound. This compact speaker is powered by a 3000mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery that offers 12 hours of continuous, high-quality audio playtime. Sporting durable, waterproof fabric materials that are available in 6 vibrant colours, Flip 4 is the all purpose, all weather companion that takes the party everywhere. It also features a built-in noise and echo cancelling speakerphone for crystal clear conference calls, and JBL Connect+ technology that can wirelessly links more than 100 JBL Connect+ enabled speakers together to amplify the listening experience. With a simple button press, you can activate and talk to Siri or Google Now from your JBL Flip 4. Output power (W) 2 x 8 Charging time (hrs) 3.5
